README: chords: is for configuration of the CHORDS connection.
nest: is for configuration of the Nest API connection.

nest.project_id: The SDM Device Access Console (console.nest.google.com) Project ID
nest.code: The access code delivered in the URL to the redirect_api, after passing the consent/login screens
nest.access_token: Access token fetched by the app when first requesting tokens (automatically added to this file)
nest.refresh_token: Refresh token fetched by the app when first requesting tokens (automatically added to this file)
